spec_data.Name: perl-File-Copy-Recursive
spec_data.Description:
This module copies and moves directories recursively to an optional depth and
attempts to preserve each file or directory's mode.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:30:01 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Extension for recursively copying files and directories
